org.apache.beam.sdk.util.state

Class StateSpecs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.util.state.StateSpecs

  • @Experimental(value=STATE)
public class StateSpecs
extends Object
    Static utility methods for creating StateSpec instances.

      static <T> StateSpec<Object,BagState<T>> bag(Coder<T> elemCoder)

      • value

        public static <T> StateSpec<Object,ValueState<T>> value(Coder<T> valueCoder)
        Create a simple state spec for values of type T.

      • combiningValue

        public static <InputT,AccumT,OutputT> StateSpec<Object,AccumulatorCombiningState<InputT,AccumT,OutputT>> combiningValue(Coder<AccumT> accumCoder,
                                                                                                                        Combine.CombineFn<InputT,AccumT,OutputT> combineFn)
        Create a state spec for values that use a Combine.CombineFn to automatically merge multiple InputTs into a single OutputT.

      • keyedCombiningValue

        public static <K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT> StateSpec<K,AccumulatorCombiningState<InputT,AccumT,OutputT>> keyedCombiningValue(Coder<AccumT> accumCoder,
                                                                                                                          Combine.KeyedCombineFn<K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT> combineFn)
        Create a state spec for values that use a Combine.KeyedCombineFn to automatically merge multiple InputTs into a single OutputT. The key provided to the Combine.KeyedCombineFn comes from the keyed StateAccessor.

      • keyedCombiningValueWithContext

        public static <K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT> StateSpec<K,AccumulatorCombiningState<InputT,AccumT,OutputT>> keyedCombiningValueWithContext(Coder<AccumT> accumCoder,
                                                                                                                                     CombineWithContext.KeyedCombineFnWithContext<K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT> combineFn)
        Create a state spec for values that use a CombineWithContext.KeyedCombineFnWithContext to automatically merge multiple InputTs into a single OutputT. The key provided to the Combine.KeyedCombineFn comes from the keyed StateAccessor, the context provided comes from the StateContext.

      • combiningValueFromInputInternal

        public static <InputT,AccumT,OutputT> StateSpec<Object,AccumulatorCombiningState<InputT,AccumT,OutputT>> combiningValueFromInputInternal(Coder<InputT> inputCoder,
                                                                                                                                         Combine.CombineFn<InputT,AccumT,OutputT> combineFn)
        Create a state spec for values that use a Combine.CombineFn to automatically merge multiple InputTs into a single OutputT.

        This determines the Coder<AccumT> from the given Coder<InputT>, and should only be used to initialize static values.

      • bag

        public static <T> StateSpec<Object,BagState<T>> bag(Coder<T> elemCoder)
        Create a state spec that is optimized for adding values frequently, and occasionally retrieving all the values that have been added.

      • watermarkStateInternal

        public static <W extends BoundedWindow> StateSpec<Object,WatermarkHoldState<W>> watermarkStateInternal(OutputTimeFn<? super W> outputTimeFn)
        Create a state spec for holding the watermark.

      • convertToBagSpecInternal

        public static <K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT> StateSpec<Object,BagState<AccumT>> convertToBagSpecInternal(StateSpec<? super K,AccumulatorCombiningState<InputT,AccumT,OutputT>> combiningSpec)

public static <K> StateBinder<K> adaptTagBinder(StateTag.StateBinder<K> binder)
        Deprecated. for migration purposes only
